title: Honestly, good job balance team!
body:
Last night, I played against a talon as karthus mid lane, I got first blood at 2:00, and began to snowball a good amount, he began rushing a hexdrinker, which I didn't notice, and my damage dropped a lot, he could kill me now. I got fed off of turnarounds and rushed a ryalais. The game kept going, and while I did get majorly fed, I still wouldn't have felt hexdrinker and maw to be too oppressively
 strong, and talon was able to kill most of my team!
We still won because 23/10 karthus op though

Lets be real here, Talon doesn't "catch" anyone. If you aren't under turret he presses E. Hell if you are under turret and at <70% hp he still presses E. You shouldn't have to camp your turret or leave lane entirely the moment an enemy champion hits lvl 6 or is lvl 3-5 and manages to poke you once or twice with an easy to land ability. Also, even assassins should have counterplay.
